driverInputPrompts.name: Select Version:
driverInputPrompts.type: enum; Format (DB2 Universal Database 10.x->DB210|DB2 Universal Database 9->DB29)

driverInputPrompts.name: Data flow:
driverInputPrompts.type: enum; Format (bi-directional->both|Identity Manager to database (subscribe)->subscribe|database to Identity Manager (publish)->publish)

driverInputPrompts.name: JDBC implementation
driverInputPrompts.type: enum; Format (IBM Type 4 Universal (filenames- db2jcc.jar, db2jcc_license_<type>.jar)->db2driver|Some Other JDBC Implementation->_custom)

driverInputPrompts.name: Post polling statements:
driverInputPrompts.value: DELETE FROM indirect.indirect_process; DELETE FROM direct.direct_process
